Umphandle > Urhulumente > The Government of South Africa > Icandelo Loonondyebo Besizwe

ICANDELO LOONONDYEBO BESIZWE: UBUME






UBUME

IINKONZO



IINDABA

USHICILELO



AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



Ngeenkqubo zolawulo lwezimali zoluntu, nkqubo ezo zinenkathalo, uqoqosho, ubulumko ubulungisa nozinzo UNondyebo weSizwe ukhuthaza:
* uphuhliso lwezoqoqosho
* ukuphakanyiswa komgangatho wolawulo olululo
* inkqubela eluntwini
* ukuphakanyiswa komgangatho wokuphila.


Eli Sebe lijongene:
* nohlahlo lwabiwo-mali lonyaka
* nokukhuthaza ukubambisana kwecandelo loluntu necandelo loshishino labucala
* nokulawula iiaseti namatyala esizwe
* nokulawulwa kwezimali zoluntu
* neZiko i-Financial Intelligence Centre (FIC)
* kwaneminye imisebenzi eyodwa, ebandakanya unxibelelwano phakathi kwemisbenzi yokubonelela, iindlela nemimiselo yocwangciso kunye nebhodi yombuso yeethenda.


IWEBSITE: www.treasury.gov.za
